## Description

Provide a brief summary of the changes and which issue is fixed.

## Type of Change

- [ ] New Feature (ML Model/API Endpoint)
- [ ] Bug Fix
- [ ] Refactoring / Tech Debt
- [ ] Documentation Update

## Checklist

- [ ] My code follows the style guidelines of this project.
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code.
- [ ] (ML) I have verified model performance metrics.
- [ ] (Backend) I have updated the API documentation (OpenAPI).
- [ ] Tests pass locally, and new tests have been added where applicable.
- [ ] I have added necessary documentation (if appropriate).
